title: Boutique French Vineyard Heritage Elegance with Onsite Dining, Spa and Outdoor Pool
description:
Experience the charm of northeastern France from this luxurious retreat, set in the historic heart of the Alsatian vineyards. Effortlessly blending 16th-century architecture with modern elegance, 5 Terres Hôtel & Spa - MGallery Collection offers a resplendent spa and a tranquil outdoor pool lined with sun-drenched loungers. Indulge in refined dining at La Table du 5, where fresh, seasonal ingredients are transformed into exquisite dishes, perfectly paired with local wines, or enjoy curated French tastings at the Wine Bar.

Beyond the hotel’s comforts, wander through the quaint cobblestone streets of Barr, explore the picturesque surrounding vineyards or savour the region’s renowned wines and traditional cuisine at charming local eateries.
offer_address: 11 Place De L'Hotel De Ville, Barr 67140, France
